system.description: Mediaries of magical secrets. One may become a witch through the whispers of a familiar or the favor of a being from beyond.

features.name: Occultist
features.description:
You gain a Perk with a prerequisite of being Trained with Mysticism, and you can Cast Spells using Mysticism.

Spells: You learn 4 Spells. You learn 1 other Spell every 2 Witch Levels hereafter.

Mana: Your Maximum Mana is equal to (4 Ã— your Witch Level), and the highest amount of Mana you can spend to Cast a Spell is equal to (Awareness + half your Witch Level, round up). You regain spent Mana when you Rest.

features.name: Hex
features.description: You can choose for the effects of a Spell you Cast (not the damage) to become continual for one of the Targets until you use this Feature on a different Target. This does not require your Focus. The number of Spells you can have as continual this way at the same time is equal to (half your Witch Level, round up).

features.name: Ritualism
features.description: You can finish a Ritual that requires a Scene as an Action. You can only do so once per Shift.

features.name: Things Betwixt
features.description: Once per Scene, you can use your Action or skip your Move to become invisible until your next Turn. This requires your Focus.

features.name: Coventry
features.description: You can Cast Spells that Near Allies can Cast.

features.name: Widdershins
features.description: The Target of your Hex is Weak to damage you deal. This does not ignore Immunity. Further, your Spells ignore Status Immunities of the Target of your Hex.

features.name: Ritualism II
features.description: You can now use your Ritualism Feature twice per Shift.
